import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import CheckoutSteps from "../components/CheckoutSteps" const PlaceOrderScreen=(props)=>{ const cart=useSelector(state=>state.cart); if(!cart.paymentMethod){ props.history.push('/payment'); } const toPrice=(num)=>Number(num.toFixed(2)); return (

  • Shipping

    Name :{cart.shippingAddress.fullName}
    Address :{cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city} ,{cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {cart.shippingAddress.country}

  • Payment

    Method :{cart.paymentMethod}

  • Order Items

      { cart.cartItems.map(item=>(
    • {item.name}
      {item.qty} x ${item.price}=${item.qty*item.price}
      • )) }
) } export default PlaceOrderScreen;
